metadata.name: London Nights
metadata.description:
London has some fantastic architecture.  The cityscape is continuously evolving and there are lots of historical buildings, mixed with many modern ones. 
When everything is lit up at night, London looks incredible and the London Eye is one of the many big attractions!  On New Year's Eve, there will be thousands of people at this location celebrating the New Year!

The Story  
I was on my way home from a day out with friends and we decided to make a quick stop at London.  I had my camera with me, but being a spontaneous stop, I wasn't prepared for night photography.  I had no tripod or filters, just my camera and a kit lens.  In order to get a long exposure, my camera needed to be steady.  The last thing I'd want is my camera falling in the river, so whilst holding tightly to my camera strap, I balanced the camera on the side of the bridge.  After some manipulation to an empty drinks can, I was able to make a support for my lens that gave the angle I needed.  The camera was now steady and I was ready to start shooting!
